NavBody.buscarP: Escribe aquí lo que quieras buscar
BodyDiferenciadoresTexto.entrega: We deliver your purchases to the door of your home or office.
BodyDiferenciadoresTexto.electronico: You can pay directly with your credit or debit card.
BodyDiferenciadoresTexto.nacionales: All products at Mi Mercadito are made in Costa Rica
BodyDiferenciadoresTexto.telefonico: Write to us at 6128-1490 and we will gladly assist you
